alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 2:33PM MST until January 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in lower elevation portions of the valley to 4 to 6 inches in higher elevation western portions of the valley. * WHERE...Western Uinta Basin. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Be prepared for periods of winter driving conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
